textBox.richText: hey everyone! last semester's drama house shabbat was unbelievable--over 110 people showed up and celebrated shabbat with Chabad house on campus at the Drama House. This semester is going to be incredible! Come join us at the Drama House at 7:00 pm on Friday, April 4th for services followed by Devorah Leah's home-cooked food. Back by popular demand, In Between the Lines will be our special guests for a during dinner performance! please RSVP so that we can know to expect you! ***we are arranging for an ASL interpreter to be present, so if you have any Deaf Jewish friends who would like to attend, send them on over!***
